data.text: Ashilhoko aka, mwaarumelhelhaka Athithi Yesu Kuristo, Athithi o nthimicho, nhaanyaraphe attu.
Ukhalhawaya awaaka ntu nawanre ikuwo chorera ni ipete yo idhahabu nnikokhoni mwawe u inupa inyu yo unlhapelha Nlhuku, ni vavawo nkaawa ntu hirina ittu mwommo nawanre matapwata,
mwanlhohaka ntu warenlhe ulhe ni umwiirelha, Kharibu nkhalheke va varenreva ni vavawo mmwiirelhaka ntu nshikini uyo, Mweemelheke uwo ama mwiiraka nkhalheke vathi vawo,
chani vavawo khannoona wiira nhonyarapha? Chani khannochuwelha vavawo wiira khannohukumulha wo uholhelhiya ni nrima wo uhilhoka?
Ashilhoko aka, nkakiiweni! Chani Nlhuku kaathanlhe attu ahirina ittu o velhaponi va wiira akhalhe phi attu o nhakhu wo mupishani nrima anohalha upochera Imwene ilhehiye attu anonttuna.
Nansho mwaatti khannaalhoha attu ahirina ittu. Anaa attu o nhakhu kahiwe phi yayo anowoonelhani mwaatti ayo, kahii phi yayo anouhukumulhani ayo?
Ni ayo kahiwe phi ayo anoruwana nchina ninyu no nthimicho na Kuristo nneehanelhiya inyu nno?
Nansho mwavarecheshaka malhehero o Imwene ya Nlhuku ihimiye ni Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Mwaattuneke amwatamana inyu thoko chineettuna inyu mwaanene.” Wo ikekhiaye, vavawo nnoopanga ittu yoombone.
Nansho mwaanyaraphaka nhowonya, Malhehero anouhukumulhani wiira nhotteka.
Ukhalhawaya ntu awonyaka ata nlhove nimoka nhina Malhehero a Nlhuku, howonya Ikekhia yonkhaye.
Ukhalhawaya yoyo eerilhe “Nhilhavelhave” uyo, phi yoyo enre, “Nhiive.” Paahi etu inakhalhaka khannolhavalhava nansho nheeva, nhowonya Malhehero onkhaye.
Paahi etu mulhumacheke ni waaweha attu thoko attu anohalha uhukumulhiya ni Malhehero anooria unihiyerera.
Nlhuku khanowa aamwonelha ikiriri ntu hirina ikiriri. Nansho attu o ikiriri khanoova uhukumulhiya ni Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya ikiriri ya Nlhuku inoopwaha ihukumu.
Ashilhoko aka, inoreerani ntu vaneera awe noopisha nrima nansho hoonihaka wo mitheko choombone? Chani yoyo nrima uyo unowa umoopolha?
Ikhalhe wiira haawo munnihu mmoka ama mwanrokorihu mmoka noowolhiya ithalha ama hothalhelhiya.
Vanorera chani weerelha yayo, “Nlhuku ovaherekeni! Nrweeke wo mpuha mwootteke mooro, mwalhieke nnoowona, wo uhimmaha ittu iriyoothe yo unkavihera mwiiruttuni mwawe?”
Paahi etu upisha nrima vekha aya wo uhooniha mitheko yoyo uhokhwa.
Nansho ntu nowooria wiira, “Inyu nhanaa nrima, ni mii kihanaa mitheko.” Eiyo nkooniheke etu nrima inyu uhiri ni ntheko uyo, ni mii kinowoonihani nrima wo mitheko chaka.
Inyu nnorumelhelha wiira Nlhuku ri mmoka tu. Aye! Nansho ata mashoka o unanara ni chiyo chinomoova yoyo ni unthukumelha.
Nhopwapwa inyu! Chani mwoonihiyeke wiira nrima wo uhikhalha mitheko uhokhwa?

Apwiiya Aburahimu aalhakelhelhiye chani wiira ahovarechesha ikekhia mmiholho wa Nlhuku? Wo nlhatu wo mitheko chaya vankuminhe aya isadaka yo upahiya mwaamwanaya Isaka vamadhubahuni vo ukumiheriya isadaka.
Paahi etu mwooneke vavawo wiira upisha nrima waya wahoonia wo mitheko chaya ni vavawo nrima uyo wahokhomaalhihiya.
Paahi Malhove Matakatifu yahotimira venre aya, “Aburahimu ahonrumelhelha Nlhuku. Ni wo nrima waya ahoonia wiira ahopanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku.” Nkayeehaniya ampwana awe Nlhuku.
Haya etu nchuwelheke wiira ntu naalhakelhiya wiira hovarechesha ikekhia mmiholho wa Nlhuku wo mitheko chawe kuhii wo upisha nrima vekha ayaru.

Yaari thoko chiichammo wa Narahabu, nthiyana o ulhavalhava ulhe. Ahaalhakelhelhiya wiira ahovarechesha ikekhia mmiholho wa Nlhuku wo nlhatu wo mitheko chawe, vaapochenre awe akarumiya o uhotelha aakihaka wo waaviriha iphiro chikina.
Paahi etu thoko vari aya iruttu ihimmumulha ihokhwa, phiri aya chiichammo nrima uhinooniha mitheko uhokhwa.
